text: May 5, 2018 / 1:57 PM / Updated 3 hours ago IPL Scoreboard Reuters Staff 3 Min Read May 5 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at close of play on the first day of match 35 between Chennai Super Kings and Royal Challengers Bangalore on Saturday at Pune, India Chennai Super Kings win by 6 wickets Royal Challengers Bangalore 1st innings Parthiv Patel c&b Ravindra Jadeja 53 Brendon McCullum c Shardul Thakur b Lungi Ngidi 5 Virat Kohli b Ravindra Jadeja 8 AB de Villiers st MS Dhoni b Harbhajan Singh 1 Mandeep Singh c David Willey b Ravindra Jadeja 7 Colin de Grandhomme c Suresh Raina b David Willey 8 Murugan Ashwin st MS Dhoni b Harbhajan Singh 1 Tim Southee Not Out 36 Umesh Yadav Run Out David Willey 1 Mohammed Siraj Run Out Ambati Rayudu 3 Extras 0b 3lb 0nb 0pen 1w 4 Total (20.0 overs) 127-9 Fall of Wickets : 1-9 McCullum, 2-47 Kohli, 3-56 de Villiers, 4-73 Singh, 5-84 Patel, 6-85 Ashwin, 7-87 de Grandhomme, 8-89 Yadav, 9-127 Siraj Did Not Bat : Chahal Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex David Willey 4 0 24 1 6.00 Lungi Ngidi 4 0 24 1 6.00 1w Shardul Thakur 2 0 19 0 9.50 Ravindra Jadeja 4 0 18 3 4.50 Harbhajan Singh 4 0 22 2 5.50 Dwayne Bravo 2 0 17 0 8.50 Chennai Super Kings 1st innings Shane Watson b Umesh Yadav 11 Ambati Rayudu c Mohammed Siraj b Murugan Ashwin 32 Suresh Raina c Tim Southee b Umesh Yadav 25 Dhruv Shorey c Mandeep Singh b Colin de Grandhomme 8 MS Dhoni Not Out 31 Dwayne Bravo Not Out 14 Extras 0b 3lb 1nb 0pen 3w 7 Total (18.0 overs) 128-4 Fall of Wickets : 1-18 Watson, 2-62 Raina, 3-78 Rayudu, 4-80 Shorey Did Not Bat : Jadeja, Willey, Singh, Ngidi, Thakur Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Tim Southee 3 0 30 0 10.00 Yuzvendra Chahal 3 1 29 0 9.67 1w 1nb Umesh Yadav 3 0 15 2 5.00 Mohammed Siraj 2 0 18 0 9.00 Colin de Grandhomme 4 0 16 1 4.00 Murugan Ashwin 3 0 17 1 5.67 2w Umpire Nitin Menon Umpire Yeshwant Barde Video Marais Erasmus Match Referee Javagal Srinath
